title: Proofs that the Gerber Statistic is Positive Semidefinite. (arXiv:2305.05663v1 [q-fin.PM])
abstract: In this brief note, we prove that both forms of the Gerber statistic introduced in Gerber et al. (2022) are positive semi-definite.
